item.title: UML @ Classroom - Chapter 3 (Creating a Use Case Diagram)
item.description: This is continuation of my notes on Use Case Diagrams from the book UML @ Classroom. The first step is to identify actors and use cases and then place them in relationships with one another.

item.title: UML @ Classroom - Chapter 3 (Use Case Diagram)
item.description: Use Case Diagram Allows to describe the possible usage scenarios (use cases) that a system is developed for. Doesn’t address realisation details, for example data structures or algorithms.
